name: Inverted (itch) (freakofif)
description:
Created in less than 48 hours combined, this game was created for a Middle Eastern game jam called Game Zanga. The theme was parallel universes, and the team agreed on choosing gravity as the key element where in this universe, gravity pushes you away instead of pulling you down.

Here, we follow Eli, conspiracy theorist who, in his universe, never believe that gravity pulls you down. One day, the gravity field created on his earth malfunction, but he was prepared! Help Eli get to the spaceship that will bring him to safety. 

The closer you are to the ground, the less "gravity" there is, and the further you are the more the "gravity". The bar on the top is a timer which will restart the game when it runs out, and if Eli falls towards the sky the game will restart.
